scripts.build:gallery: npm run build; npm run build:gallery --w=@apps/gallery
scripts.build:laboratory: npm run build; npm run build:laboratory --w=@apps/laboratory
scripts.pre-publish: npm run lint; npm run typecheck; npm run prettier; npm run build; npm run new-version; npm install
scripts.publish:latest: lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag latest
scripts.publish:canary: lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag canary
scripts.clean: rm -rf `find . -type d -name node_modules -o -name dist -o -name .next -o -name out -o -name storybook-static`; rm package-lock.json
